title: Bessent Sees ‘Unruly’ Chinese Trading Behind Gold Price Swings
description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent cited Chinese traders as a reason behind last week’s wild swings in the gold market.
content: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent cited Chinese traders as a reason behind last week’s wild swings in the gold market.
